Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model

Class Shelf

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Shelf
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Shelf extends Object implements Serializable
Class that describes a player's shelf, with methods to return the infos about it, and the method for inserting a tile in given column
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Shelf()
    Constructor method of the class Declares the matrix of Optional at the fixed dimensions of 6x5, then initialize all the values at Optional.empty()

      public void putTile(Tile tile, int col)
      Insert of a single tile at the bottom of a specified column
      Parameters:
      tile - is the Tile object the player wants to put in their shelf
      col - is the column where the player wants to put the tile

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()
      Method to check if the shelf is full.
      Returns:
      true if there aren't any empty spaces int the matrix, false if there is at least one

    • tilesLeftColumn

      public int tilesLeftColumn(int column)
      Method to check how many more tiles you can insert in a column
      Parameters:
      column - is the column of the shelf you want to check
      Returns:
      tilesLeft is how many more tiles can fit in that column of the shelf
